sentences.cn: 偷汽车 、 入室盗窃 、 偷盗等.

sentences.en: First he established the fact that Whittet had been convicted of grand larceny.
sentences.cn: 他先确定一项事实:惠德特曾犯过大盗窃罪被定罪.

sentences.en: Haggerman now faces two to 20 years in prison on grand larceny charges.
sentences.cn: 哈格曼被控重大盗窃罪，面临2至20年的刑期。

sentences.en: Have you over been arrested for larceny?
sentences.cn: 你有偷盗被捕的经历 吗 ?

sentences.en: He is still in prison for larceny.
sentences.cn: 他因为盗窃罪,现在还在坐班房呢.

sentences.en: He was arrested on a charge of larceny.
sentences.cn: 他因被指控犯有盗窃罪而被抓.

sentences.en: He was put in jail for grand larceny.
sentences.cn: 他因重大盗窃案而被监禁.

sentences.en: I mean the crime explosion, all the way from big crime down to petty larceny.
sentences.cn: 我是指犯罪的激增, 从最大的犯罪直到小偷小摸.

sentences.en: It was an essential of the common law crime of larceny.
sentences.cn: 它是构成普通法中的盗窃罪的必要条件.

sentences.en: The fool saw nothing. Such simple larceny.
sentences.cn: 艾德温(盗贼)这笨蛋什么也没看见, 这么简单的偷窃.

sentences.en: The man was imprisoned for grand larceny.
sentences.cn: 那人因大盗窃案罪而被监禁.

sentences.en: The man was imprisoned for larceny.
sentences.cn: 那个人因犯盗窃罪而入狱.

sentences.en: The man was put in jail for grand larceny.
sentences.cn: 那人因重大盗窃案而被监禁.

sentences.en: What what this case crime suspect makes is larceny.
sentences.cn: 本案犯罪嫌疑人所犯的是盗窃罪.

sentences.en: Your friend belongs to the accomplice of larceny.
sentences.cn: 你朋友属于盗窃罪的共犯.

words.tran_cn: 盗窃的，偷窃的；犯盗窃罪的

trans.tran_en: the act or crime of stealing
